channel.title: story on Meantint's BLog
channel.description: Recent content in story on Meantint's BLog

item.title: Everyday I Ask
item.description: You know, some people makes mistakes, and have to bear the consequences, for the rest of their life. I made, one good decision when I was far younger than you are. Later I know it was the right decision. But I also have to bear the consquences, for the rest of my life. I wish you a good family, and happiness.
